Items.title: Maple Bacon Donut
Items.desc: A unique combination of sweet and savory flavors, this donut features a maple glaze topped with crispy bacon bits.

Items.title: Jelly-filled Donut
Items.desc: pastry is filled with a sweet fruit jelly, typically raspberry or strawberry.

Items.title: Milky Donuts
Items.desc: . Each bite offers a smooth and comforting taste, reminiscent of a creamy milkshake or a sweet dairy treat.

Items.title: Glazed Donut
Items.desc: A classic donut with a smooth, sweet glaze covering its fluffy interior.

Items.title: Cheddar Cheese
Items.desc: A versatile cheese with a rich, tangy flavor and a smooth texture, perfect for melting on sandwiches, burgers, or nachos.

Items.title: Mozzarella Cheese
Items.desc: A mild and creamy cheese with a stretchy texture when melted, commonly used on pizzas, lasagnas, and caprese salads.

Items.title: Swiss Cheese
Items.desc: Known for its nutty and slightly sweet flavor, Swiss cheese has a firm texture and features iconic holes.

Items.title: Gouda Cheese
Items.desc: Gouda is delicious on its own, sliced in sandwiches, or melted into macaroni and cheese.

Items.title: Margherita Pizza
Items.desc: A classic pizza featuring a thin crust topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil

Items.title: Hawaiian Pizza
Items.desc: Hawaiian pizza features tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, ham, and pineapple.

Items.title: BBQ Chicken Pizza
Items.desc: A modern twist on traditional pizza, BBQ chicken pizza includes barbecue sauce instead of tomato sauce.

Items.title: Veggie Supreme Pizza
Items.desc: A vegetarian-friendly option loaded with a variety of colorful vegetables such as bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, olives, and tomatoes.
